definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: There aring a lot of secrets in the man heart can't say literally that let wife listen to.
sentences.chinese: 男人心中有好多秘密不能随便说给妻子听。

sentences.english: Jim, and his wife Paige, drive around the world in a modified Mercedes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和他的妻子佩奇，推动全世界的改装奔驰车。

sentences.english: The papal captain have vainly endeavoured to induce his wife to remain behind him .
sentences.chinese: 教廷的队长曾白费力气地试图说服妻子留下不去。

sentences.english: Wanting to do him dirt, she sent his wife a poison-pen letter.
sentences.chinese: 施诡计就写了一封恶意中伤的信给他的妻子。

sentences.english: Before dawn, the wife went downstairs to prepare the family feast.
sentences.chinese: 在黎明前，妻子下楼去准备家里的酒席。

sentences.english: When was your wife's last menstrual period?
sentences.chinese: 你妻子上一次例假是在什么时候？

sentences.english: He was abashed at forgetting his wife's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 他因忘了妻子的生日而感到羞愧。

sentences.english: The lucky winner enjoys his choice of wives and lovers.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的优胜者可以有权选择不止一位妻子和爱人。

sentences.english: She announced that his wife had just given birth to quadruplets .
sentences.chinese: 她宣称他的妻子刚刚生了四胞胎。

sentences.english: No wonder his wife is penniless; he is always playing the horses and losing his money. (CDIP)
sentences.chinese: 难怪他妻子身无分文，他老是赌赛马，把钱都输光了。

sentences.english: But his wife Cao Jingyun was opposed.
sentences.chinese: 但他的妻子曹静云却反对这么做。

sentences.english: Oh, this is my wife Lena.
sentences.chinese: 哦，对了，这是我的妻子蕾娜。

sentences.english: It was my neighbor’s wife! I rushed in without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 原来是我邻居的妻子在叫唤，我毫不犹豫的冲了过去。

sentences.english: He does everything his wife says; She really leads him by the nose .
sentences.chinese: 他对妻子惟命是从，确实被妻子牵着鼻子走的。

sentences.english: He does everything his wife says; She really leads him by the nose .
sentences.chinese: 他对妻子惟命是从，确实被妻子牵着鼻子走的。
